title: Spectre Nightmares and Visitations
description: Many things scare us. But the most fearful things are those that infect our nightmares and visitations. Monsters from the closet or from another planet. Ghosts that haunt more than houses. Werewolves are not the only shapeshifters to beware of. Children can be taken from more than the human kind of monsters. Even normal things can be the start of a heart-pounding terror. Prepare to step beyond the pages into Spectre Nightmares and Visitations.Just tell yourself that they're only stories.If want the eBook version find it at http://www.genreconnections.com/shop/...
author: Pamela K. Kinney
